channel.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Firewall on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Hardware_Firewall on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Hardware_Firewall
item.description: SoftLayer_Hardware_Firewall Datatype Description The SoftLayer_Hardware_Firewall data type contains general information relating to a single SoftLayer firewall. Local accountId A hardware's associated [[SoftLayer_Account|account]] id. Type: integer bareMetalInstanceFlag When true, this flag specifies that a hardware is Bare Metal Server. Bare Metal Servers are physical bare metal servers that are billed with the same options as Virtual Servers, with monthly and hourly rates. Bare Metal instances are ordered based on processor core count and ram amount.
